onlyNumbersCharactersSpecial: only letters, numbers and the mentioned special characters
RegisterSuccessful:
Your account has been created successfully.
We have sent you an email with a confirmation link. Please confirm your email address to log in.

If you have not received an email, please check your spam folder.
RegisterFailedMessage: Registration failed. Please try again later.
ActivationCodeInfoMessage:
The activation code is only required if you were given a username and activation code by an administrator to create your account.

If you do not have an activation code, choose a username that is not already taken and leave the activation code field empty.
